name: MosaicVoice
long_description: MosaicVoice makes it easy for call centers to automate their Quality Assurance function. Our software listens to customer conversations in real-time and identifies and alerts agents and managers to any compliance violations as they happen
one_liner: We make it simple for call centers to automate quality assurance.

name: Arini
long_description:
Arini is the AI receptionist for dentists that answers phone calls, and schedules appointments. Most dental appointments are scheduled over the phone by overworked receptionists who put patients on hold and miss a third of incoming calls. This costs clinics a 15% loss in revenue.

Private equity investment fueled large dental groups to acquire thousands of clinics in the past few years. We are selling to these groups, since their clinics have a standardized tech stack. They’re also growing really fast - in just two years they will make up 40% of the US dental market.

Dental is just the beginning.

name: Domu Technology Inc.
long_description:
Domu automates debt collection calls for banks using GenAI.

After 8 months of being live, we have half a million in annual recurring revenue with customers like BBVA, Skandia and BNP Paribas.
one_liner: Domu automates debt collection calls for banks like BBVA using GenAI.…

name: Dodo
long_description:
Dodo provides AI Receptionists tailored for medical practices, starting with vet clinics. 

Every third veterinary receptionist leaves their job each year. At the same time, the pandemic caused a pet boom, leading to a record demand for vet services. Facing understaffed and undertrained support, clients spend an average of 67% of their call time listening to hold music and phone trees (“press 1 for x”). While waiting to be connected, they take their business elsewhere. 

We built the first voice agent specifically for vets, finetuned on veterinary knowledge and trained on protocols taken directly from receptionists’ manuals, which often span multiple binders. It answers every call, addresses customer inquiries, and interacts with internal practice software to update patient files, manage schedules, and execute necessary administrative tasks.
one_liner: AI Receptionists for Medical Front Desks
